code: import axios from'axios';const api=axios.create({baseURL:'http://localhost:8000/api/'});export const fetchProducts=async()=>{const response=await api.get('products/');return response.data;};export const fetchLowStock=async()=>{const response=await api.get('low-stock/');return response.data;};export const deleteProduct=async id=>{await api.delete('products/${id}/');};export const downloadPDF=()=>{window.open('http://localhost:8000/api/report/pdf/','_blank');};export default api;
